title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: f''(x) = 0 or f(x) = 0

1 point is earned for the equation in one variable

1 point is earned for the answer

At this inflection point, f''(x) = 0 and f(x) = 0.

f ″ (x)=0⇒ −k 4 x 3/2 + 1 x 2 =0⇒k= 4 x f(x)=0⇒k x −lnx=0⇒k= lnx x Therefore, 4 x = lnx x                 ⇒4=lnx                 ⇒x= e 4                 ⇒k= 4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaaceWGMb GbayaacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaeyO0H49aaSaa aeaacqGHsislcaWGRbaabaGaaGinaiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaio dacaGGVaGaaGOmaaaaaaGccqGHRaWkdaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaWG 4bWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaakiabg2da9iaaicdacqGHshI3ca WGRbGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaI0aaabaWaaOaaaeaacaWG4baaleqa aaaaaOqaaiaadAgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaey O0H4Taam4AamaakaaabaGaamiEaaWcbeaakiabgkHiTiGacYgacaGG UbGaamiEaiabg2da9iaaicdacqGHshI3caWGRbGaeyypa0ZaaSaaae aaciGGSbGaaiOBaiaadIhaaeaadaGcaaqaaiaadIhaaSqabaaaaaGc baGaaeivaiaabIgacaqGLbGaaeOCaiaabwgacaqGMbGaae4Baiaabk hacaqGLbGaaiilamaalaaabaGaaGinaaqaamaakaaabaGaamiEaaWc beaaaaGccqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiGacYgacaGGUbGaamiEaaqaamaaka aabaGaamiEaaWcbeaaaaaakeaacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGa aeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccaca qGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaeyO0H4TaaGinaiabg2da9iGacYga caGGUbGaamiEaaqaaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaae iiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqG GaGaaeiiaiaabccacqGHshI3caWG4bGaeyypa0JaamyzamaaCaaale qabaGaaGinaaaaaOqaaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGa aeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacaqGGaGaaeiiaiaabccaca qGGaGaaeiiaiaabccacqGHshI3caWGRbGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaaI 0aaabaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaaaaaaa@A938@
